group_1.narration: We are feared...@And then avoided.
We had no choice but to accept@the situation we were born into.
And when those of us from the East@became Magical Girls, we had to also@shoulder the burden of a fate that@would turn us into Witches.
I didn't know that Magical Girls turned@into Witches, but I did choose this path.
It was my decision, so I've accepted the fact@that I will one day become a Witch.
But...
I have not accepted our circumstances.

group_1.textLeft: It's a girl from the East.

group_1.textRight: What did they do this time?

group_1.narration: Why do people think so poorly about@those of us who were born in the East?@How can I fix our reputation?
What can I do so that@everyone in Kamihama,@not just those born in the East,@can live together in peace, as equals?
I've always thought about this, even before@I became a Magical Girl.
Then one day, he appeared.

group_1.textRight: Pleased to meet you, Kanagi Izumi.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What in the world are you?

group_1.narration: He said he would grant whatever wish I had.
So I made one.

group_1.textLeft: I want you to change how people think of @Daito.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean by how they think?

group_1.textLeft: Everyone who lives in Kamihama seems to@believe that.
But I think that belief originated in@Kamihama's history.
So I'd like you to erase that history from@the city.

group_1.textRight: Kamihama's history will definitely change@from your wish.
However, not even I know when the change@you hope for will happen.
Or it could be hundreds of years from now.
Don't you think there's a different wish@you could make to fulfill your desires?

group_1.narration: I see... Now that I think about it,@even if Kamihama's history was changed,@everyone's impression of people from Daito@might not necessarily improve.
If I made that wish, it might not solve@the root of the problem.
In that case...
If there is any way I can improve things on@my own, aside from changing Kamihama's@history, I want to know how to do it.
That way...I can change@everyone's feelings toward Daito,@my beloved hometown and birthplace,@for the better.
I made my wish with my heart full of hope.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, my wish is...
I want to know the reason why everyone@hates Daito.

group_1.narration: As a result...@I gained the power to read people's minds.
And I learned...
There wasn't a clear reason why@people hated Daito so much.
People just didn't like the East@because of Kamihama's history.@They thought it was scary because@of the crimes in the area.

group_1.textRight: A guy from the West picked a fight with@me...

group_1.textLeft: The two of us changed as a result of our@wish, but...

group_1.narration: The people of Kamihama didn't see us as@individuals, but rather, a poor environment.
That was behind the ill will towards Daito,@my beloved home...
Kamihama's opinions took root over@many long years and months.@I was facing an invisible enemy.
Some were hurt unintentionally...@Others were openly discriminated against...
In Kamihama, people had been@hurting each other for a very long time.

group_1.textLeft: All done. Your adjustments are finished.
